text: In this video, I will tell you what are ID and classes. The concept of ID and classes is one of the concepts that are confused. In fact, when I was learning HTML in my early days, I was confused in the ID and classes. ID means unique identifier. If you give an ID to an element, you will not give it to another element. But the meaning of the class is that if you want to give multiple elements to a property, you will give it multiple classes. For example, you can give a class called red, a div, and a form.
